.Release.Name:
# Release.Name [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
The release name.
.Release.Namespace:
# Release.Namespace [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
The namespace to be released into (if the manifest doesn't override).
.Release.IsUpgrade:
# Release.IsUpgrade [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is set to true if the current operation is an upgrade or rollback.
.Release.IsInstall:
# Release.IsInstall [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is set to true if the current operation is an install.
.Release.Revision:
# Release.Revision [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
The revision number for this release. On install, this is 1, and it is incremented with each upgrade and rollback.
.Release.Service:
# Release.Service [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
The service that is rendering the present template. On Helm, this is always Helm.
.Files.Get:
# Files.Get [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a function for getting a file by name (`.Files.Get config.ini`).
.Files.GetBytes:
# Files.GetBytes [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a function for getting the contents of a file as an array of bytes instead of as a string. This is useful for things like images.
.Files.Glob:
# Files.Glob [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a function that returns a list of files whose names match the given shell glob pattern.
.Files.Lines:
# Files.Lines [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a function that reads a file line-by-line. This is useful for iterating over each line in a file.
.Files.AsSecrets:
# Files.AsSecrets [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a function that returns the file bodies as Base 64 encoded strings.
.Files.AsConfig:
# Files.AsConfig [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a function that returns file bodies as a YAML map.
.Capabilities.APIVersions:
# Capabilities.APIVersions [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is a set of versions.
.Capabilities.APIVersions.Has:
# Capabilities.APIVersions.Has [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
**$version** indicates whether a version (e.g., `batch/v1`) or resource (e.g., `apps/v1/Deployment`) is available on the cluster.
.Capabilities.KubeVersion:
# Capabilities.KubeVersion [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is the Kubernetes version.
.Capabilities.KubeVersion.Version:
# Capabilities.KubeVersion.Version [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is the Kubernetes version.
.Capabilities.KubeVersion.Major:
# Capabilities.KubeVersion.Major [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is the Kubernetes major version.
.Capabilities.KubeVersion.Minor:
# Capabilities.KubeVersion.Minor [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
This is the Kubernetes minor version.
.Template.Name:
# Template.Name [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
A namespaced file path to the current template (e.g. `mychart/templates/mytemplate.yaml`).
.Template.BasePath:
# Template.BasePath [iconLink](https://helm.sh/docs/chart_template_guide/builtin_objects/)
The namespaced path to the templates directory of the current chart (e.g. `mychart/templates`).
